name: Mech Academy
description:
Mech Academy is an adult visual novel based on multiple-choice decisions. The player will assume the role of the protagonist in this story and will encounter "several characters, and try to develop your relationship with them. The player's decisions will have an impact on the evolution of the story.



"It's the year 2175, and you are the pilot of a Guardian Mech. These are gigantic war machines built to defend Earth from the Noxa, a ruthless alien race intent on conquering your planet. However, you don't belong to this time; you are actually Lieutenant Knight, a highly decorated soldier who lived in the 1970s. Due to a mysterious experiment, you have been catapulted two centuries into the future. Everything is new and complicated for you. Your world, the society in which you grew up, is profoundly different from the one you find yourself in now."



Following a bizarre series of interconnected events, you have been chosen as a pilot. Your new home is now Section 2, a training center led by Elara Sardana, a captivating commander who is as strict as she is attractive. Elara is a hybrid, half-Earthling, half-alien.

You are not the only pilot at the base;



Mei Maede is a rebellious girl with a sensual attitude. From your first encounter, she will show a strong attraction toward you.


Drana, on the other hand, is a Vorlanian, a princess from a people light-years away from Earth. Drana pilots the Ghost Mech. It will be very difficult to establish a good relationship with her; her strong, determined, duty-bound, confrontational, and especially hostile attitude toward you won't make life easy, but it will certainly be worth trying to win her over.

Lydia Helmer is a dark-haired girl with a delicate face. Lydia is the fourth pilot from Section 2. Like Drana, she also doesn't hold you in high regard. Lydia is a very reserved, shy, and closed-off girl. Getting her to open up to you won't be easy, but when she does, it will make you very happy.

Irina is the chief scientist. she is very intelligent, a genius, but she is also very distracted and forgetful. She has a too-accommodating nature. In Mech Academy

you'll have the opportunity to meet many beautiful women, all with complex and well-defined nature and behaviour. Interacting with them, seducing them, making them fall in love with you, will not be so easy and straightforward. Especially because you will be busy defending Earth from extraterrestrial invaders!

Features:
- 3000 Full Hd Images
- 90 Full Hd Animations
- 60000 words
- Multiple choices
- Music & Sound effect
- You Can Decide the Name Of the Character
- Ren'py Engine


.
Lydia is a Sparkle Mech pilot, is a third-generation pilot, and is a pilot with a higher connection value than all 95% pilots; both her grandfather and father were skilled and respected Mech pilots. Their family has a natural genetic predisposition for Guardian Mechs.



Mei is a pilot of the Wonder Mech, She is considered the bravest pilot when it comes to "getting serious" she never backs down, in fact, she is reckless. Mei was part of Section 5 (the Europe section, the most important and prestigious section), but due to an incident caused by her act of insubordination, she was suspended.


.

Elara is the director of Section 2 of the IDA agency. Loyal to duty, rules and tradition. Elara is one of the first women born from an alien mother (Cruvians) and an earthly parent. She is entrusted with base 2, a base that enriches the pilots' experience, but rarely joined battle until now

Irinia is a technological genius. Lives for science and research. Passionate about ancient pre-contact technologies (in her spare time she tries to repair the engine of an old car)


Drana is a pilot of Ghost Mech, her is Vorlanian. Haughty alien. She despises Earth both past and present. She considers Earthlings to be underdeveloped creatures. Hers was a people of mystics and noble warriors.
